title: (x) Which weight of Balantines Script is this? - Regular {Patricia}
content:
I’ve identified this as Ballantines Script, but can you tell me what weight? Thanks for your help.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203194356im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/cat-welcome_6462.gif)

 [‹ (x) Geometric bold sans 'Ongoing Series' - Neuzeit (custom by Laurenz Brunner) {Yves (Angel)}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203194356/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38803 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Intro geometric slab serif - Memphis {Raph} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203194356/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38797 "Go to next forum topic")
author: coldtoes

comments.content:
Looks like the Regular weight to me.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/ballantines-script/ef-regular/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203194356/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/ballantines-script/ef-regular/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/ballantines-script/ef-regular/")
Thanks! You guys are the best.
